mapper.update: update f_friendship set fhotnum = fhotnum+1 where fkuserid = #{userId} and fkfriendid = #{friendId}
mapper.select: select wgcnum,wnickname,wheadimage,ltime,laddress from (select wgcnum,wnickname,wheadimage from w_user wu left join w_details wd on wu.wid = wd.wid where wu.wgcnum in (select fkfriendid from f_friendship where fkuserid=#{userid})) a left join l_lastoccur ll on a.wgcnum=ll.lusergc
